Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back The Ghan Nitmiluk Katherine Gorge NT © Journey Beyond The Ghan © Journey Beyond The Ghan Expedition Telegraph Station Dinner Alice Springs The Ghan Platinum Service © Journey Beyond The Ghan Gold Service Twin Cabin © Journey Beyond The Ghan Gold Service Single Cabin By Night © Journey Beyond The Ghan Gold Service Restaurant © Journey Beyond The Ghan Platinum Club © Journey Beyond Australia Red Centre Spectacular 2026 Departures - Darwin to Adelaide by Rail 10 Nights • Rail travel • Sightseeing Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions Darwin - Katherine - Alice Springs - Kings Canyon - Uluru - Kata Tjuta - Manguri - Coober Pedy - Adelaide Operates: March - October Departing on Wednesday and Saturday Settle into The Ghan’s gentle rhythm as you travel through the country and immerse yourself in the Northern Territory’s breathtaking natural wonders on this spectacular 11-day journey. From exploring the West MacDonnell Ranges to taking your place beside spiritual Uluru and Kata Tjuta, you’ll understand why people travel great distances to see the Territory’s remarkable landscapes and icons. View more View less 10 nights + the Ghan rail, sightseeing & tour from $ 11,465 per person share twin. Flights and pre/post accommodation required is additional Enquire now Sale Period : until 10 Nov 25 or until sold out Your inclusions 4 days/3 nights aboard The Ghan from Darwin to Adelaide All meals & beverages Incredible off-train excursions to Nitmiluk (Katherine), Alice Springs, Coober Pedy and Manguri 7 nights small-group touring with Outback Spirit - West MacDonnell Ranges, Standley Chasm, Ormiston Gorge, Kings Canyon, Light Towers installation, World Heritage-listed Uluru for guided base tour and sunrise, 'Sounds of Silence' dining experience, Rock formations at Kata Tjuta and Walpa Gorge, 'Field of Light' at Uluru, Cultural experience at Wintjiri Wiru NOTE: Advance purchase fares are a discounted fare available for bookings made 6 months in advance and is subject to availability. They apply to select departures only. Gold Twin Cabin 2026 departures (Advance Purchase fares) From $11465 per person share twin Travel: Sep & Oct 26 From $12659 per person share twin Travel: May - Aug 26 During the day, relax on the three-seater lounge that converts to upper and lower beds at night. Compact, private en suite with toilet, wash basin and shower Gold Single Cabin 2026 departures (Advance Purchase Fares) From $13339 single share Travel: Sep & Oct 26 From $14475 single share Travel: May - Aug 26 Comfortable couch seat with full leg extension by day converts to a cosy bed by night to provide a restful sleep Spacious shared bathroom facilities Gold Premium Cabin 2026 departures (Advance Purchase Fares) From $12529 per person share twin Travel: Sep & Oct 26 From $13539 per person share twin Travel: May - Aug 26 Comfortable lounge by day that converts to bunk-style sleepers at night Compact en suite with a toilet, washbasin and shower Platinum Service Cabin 2026 departures (Everyday Fare) From $15275 per person share twin Travel: Apr, Sep & Oct 26 From $16605 per person share twin Travel: May - Aug 26 Private lounge by day, converted into a comfortable bedroom with either double or twin beds by night Full-size en suite Map All-inclusive meals, fine wines, and beverages A regionally-inspired menu paired with a selection of local wines Off train experiences in Katherine, Alice Springs, and Coober Pedy Evening off train experience in Manguri A spectacular dinner under the stars at the historic Telegraph Station, Alice Springs Explore Nitmiluk Gorge’s powerful natural wonders and rich Indigenous culture Venture into the underground opal mining town of Coober Pedy Terms & Conditions Sales to 10 Nov 25 or until further notice • Prices are correct as at 13 Oct 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability. Prices are per person share twin based on Advance Purchase fares. Advance Purchase fares are a discounted fare available for bookings made 6 months in advance and is subject to availability and on select departures only. Full payment may be required at the time of booking, ask your House of Travel consultant for full terms and conditions. Payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
